#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
    int x[4],i,a1,a2,a3,a4;
    for(i=0;i<=3;i++)
      scanf("%d",&x[i]);
      a1=-x[1]+x[2]-x[3];
      a2=x[3]+x[0]-x[2];
      a3=-x[0]-x[3]+x[1];
      a4=x[0]-x[1]+x[2];
            printf("%d %d %d %d\n",a1,a2,a3,a4);
   }return 0;
}
